docTitle.titlePart: A Unique Combination Of Superior Performance, Size & Cost

front.div:
A unique solution for high performance, high-speed 2-way broadband communication,
Orbit Marine's AL-7103 antenna ensures superior quality connectivity for comprehensive
on-board communication and entertainment applications. With an exclusive mechanical
design, compact dimensions, no 'keyholes' for continuous zenith-horizon communications
and built-in RF package of 4/8W BUC, Orbit's turnkey AL-7103 solution provides
up to 1-2 Mbps in an unmatched performance:cost ratio.
